name: UAnimDataModel
doc:
The Model represents the source data for animations. It contains both bone animation data as well as animated curves.
They are currently only a sub-object of a AnimSequenceBase instance. The instance derives all runtime data from the source data.

ModifiedEvent: Dynamic delegate event allows scripting to register to any broadcasted notify.
FrameRate: Rate at which the animated data is sampled
NumberOfFrames: Total number of sampled animated frames
NumberOfKeys: Total number of sampled animated keys
CurveData: Container with all animated curve data
AnimatedBoneAttributes: Container with all animated (bone) attribute data
